name: Chrome Trip
description:
Play the (offline) Dino together with your friends, in a new adventure!

An open source multiplayer (lan/internet) game build for the #GitHubGameOff jam 2017 with #GodotEngine

Sourcecode is available on github:
https://github.com/enthus1ast/chromeTrip

Requires OpenGL 3.3 or better (atm).

Music by Rolemusic
http://rolemusic.sawsquarenoise.com/
